translation.Message_0_Page_0: Ah, yes. I wanted your, honest, opinion about situation above ground. So tell me, how is the war with the Infected coming?
translation.Response_1: It feels like there are slightly less than before, but barely.
translation.Response_2: The bodies pile up but more keep crawling out of the woodwork.
translation.Response_3: Half the time it feels like for every one I kill, two appear.
translation.Response_4: I don't see any end to their numbers any time soon.
translation.Response_5: Honestly, it just keeps getting worse.
